CODE             	LONG DESCRIPTION            	SHORT DESCRIPTION    
AMEL         	AIRPLANE - MULTI-ENGINE LAND     	AMEL                      
AMES         	AIRPLANE - MULTI-ENGINE SEA      	AMES                       
ASEL          	AIRPLANE - SINGLE ENGINE LAND    	ASEL                      
ASES          	AIRPLANE - SINGLE ENGINE SEA     	ASES                      
99999         	AIRCRAFT CLASS INVALID           	ERROR MESSAGE
